content.rendered:
A start-up company in High Point is looking for an experienced Microbiologist to help them grow!

The selected candidate will be responsible for

  • Running trials
  • Managing a startup microbiology lab
  • Writing reports and procedures
  • Specifying purchases of new lab equipment
  • Other duties as assigned

Requirements:

  • Minimum BA/BS Degree, with a Masters preferred
  • Familiarity with Aseptic techniques and Clean Room Protocols
  • 16S-R RNA sequencing
  • QA/QC microbiology experience
  • Experience with fermentation and cultures
